channel.title: Player under Village Issue
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Player under Village Issue" - Player, me, although possessed of a page has not been added under her village in that section.

item.title: Re: Player under Village Issue
item.content:encoded: I think I fixed it take a look and see

item.title: Re: Player under Village Issue
item.content:encoded:
if you mean on the http://bvs.wikidot.com/players

then thats quite sad and i feel sorry for your bit of ignorance there. Since you have to add yourself on that.

item.title: Player under Village Issue
item.content:encoded:
http://bvs.wikidot.com/player:hyrrokkin
is my page, however, dispite having had the page for a month or two now,
my character has yet to be added under Moon Village in the designated spaceâ€¦
HELP!

Also, advice on how to earn enough XP for a top ranking without Legacy would be appreciated.
